ssot__ConversationEntryTranscriptExcerpt.name: Conversation Entry Transcript Excerpt
ssot__ConversationEntryTranscriptExcerpt.description: The Conversation Entry Transcript Excerpt DMO represents a portion of a transcript from a conversation entry, for example, "I need to cancel my order."

ssot__ConversationEntryId__c.description: A reference ID to the conversation entry that is the source of the conversation reason excerpt. An excerpt with a messaging session will also have the conversation entry.

ssot__id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the conversation entry transcript excerpt DMO.

ssot__ConversationIntentStatus__c.description: The status of the conversation intent for transcript excerpt.

ssot__ConversationReasonId__c.description: A reference ID to the conversation reason for the transcript excerpt.

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by the external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__DurationInSeconds__c.description: The duration of the conversation entry transcript excerpt in seconds.

ssot__EmailMessageId__c.description: A reference ID to the email message that is the source of the conversation reason excerpt.

ssot__EngagementChannelType__c.description: The engagement channel type for the conversation entry transcript excerpt.

ssot__ExcerptSequenceNumber__c.description: The sequence number for the conversation entry transcript excerpt.

ssot__ExcerptTextIndexText__c.description: The index text for the conversation entry transcript excerpt.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the conversation entry transcript excerpt.

ssot__Language__c.description: The language of the conversation entry transcript excerpt.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to the live chat transcript that is the source of the conversation reason excerpt.

ssot__MessagingSessionId__c.description: A reference ID to the messaging session that is the source of the conversation reason excerpt.

ssot__IsMoved__c.description: An indicator if the conversation entry transcript excerpt has moved.

ssot__TurnCount__c.description: The turn count for the transcript excerpt.
